author: prplput
body:
I'm a TSLA bear but everyone saying S&P is now impossible for this quarter just look at last September's index news.

There were 4 separate days with announcements of additions to the S&P 500.

LVS announced 9/26, PCRX on 9/24, NVR on 9/20, and CDW on 9/17

Dunno why everyone thinks it's a done deal. They've also said they can add components at any time...doesn't have to be on a scheduled rebalancing day.

author: stopdropandrauljulia
body:
aal has been spiking in the mornings and dipping in the afternoons for a bit, so I've been buying short term otm ($13 or 15.50) calls in the afternoon and setting a 2x sell order that usually executes without fail the next morning. Every other play I've made has been pretty fucking stupid, though I made a little money flipping shares of dphc.

All cash right now, no idea what I'm doing on tuesday, though I have been looking at 10/16 cdw 120 calls.

I still don't really know what I'm doing so I wouldn't take any advice from me.
